metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13818 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
** DISPUTED ** Twig before 2.4.4 allows Server-Side Template Injection (SSTI) via the search search_key parameter. NOTE: the vendor points out that Twig itself is not a web application and states that it is the responsibility of web applications using Twig to properly wrap input to it.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13818` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-twig - 2.4.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: twig package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.6-1').
